definitions.definition: To hang or be suspended over (something); to overhang.
Figuratively to hang over (someone) as a threat or danger.
To threaten to happen; to be about to happen, to be imminent.
Something that impends or threatens; an expected event.
Approaching; drawing near; about to happen or expected to happen.
definitions.example: I have no time right now because of an impending paper submission deadline.
